title: Peer-Assisted Learning (PAL) Workshop for Improving Clinical Cognitive Skills

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: A peer case analysis and discussion-centered education program aimed at strengthening clinical reasoning skills for current practitioners.

learning_goals: Learners can extract key symptoms and test results from clinical cases with 80% accuracy.
Learners can structure diagnostic reasoning processes into three or more stages based on peer feedback.
Learners can achieve peer evaluation satisfaction scores of 4.5/5 or higher in the peer assessment system.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
